prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that shines in vibrant red and has blue accents.
Show me a powerful insectoid Pokemon with sharp claws and a menacing look.
Imagine a dual-type Pokemon that blends steel and bug features seamlessly.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in urban settings with a sleek, armored appearance.
Generate a fierce-looking Pokemon with a unique color scheme and agile movements.
Make a Pokemon with impressive wings and a striking red body that intimidates foes.
Give me an advanced evolution of a starter Pokemon with a cool bug/steel design.
